==== asyncArrowFunctionCapturesArguments_es6.ts (2 errors) ====
    class C {
       method() {
          function other() {}
          var fn = async () => await other.apply(this, arguments);
                                           ~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'apply' does not exist on type '() => void'.
       }
    }
    
    function f() {
       return async () => async () => arguments.length;
                                                ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'length' does not exist on type '{}'.
    }
